venues.name: Osmosis Day Spa Sanctuary
venues.review: The only cedar enzyme bath in the United States, and that alone is reason to drive to Freestone. You're buried in fragrant cedar, rice bran, and plant enzymes that generate their own heat as they ferment around you. The Japanese garden meditation that follows is not optional. One of the most unique wellness experiences in the country.

venues.name: Fairmont Sonoma Mission Inn Spa
venues.review: Built over natural artesian mineral springs with water at 112°F. The thermal mineral pools are the draw — five of them, set in a mission-style courtyard. A full-day experience that pairs perfectly with a tasting appointment down the road.
